name: Madhu Saini
bio: Hello, I'm Madhu Saini. I am an Enthusiastic Open-Source contributor, Web Developer, currently diving straight in Open Source and believing in collaboration instead of competition.

milestones.title: Made Chatting Application
milestones.description: This is a fully responsive chat application with social authentication including Google and Facebook using Firebase online statuses, great design and functionality, image support, ability to create multiple rooms and much more.

milestones.title: Made Virtual Assistant
milestones.description: Virtual voice assistant with features like speak to search Google and Wikipedia, ask the time, play music and YouTube, open VS Code and Reddit, etc.

milestones.title: Made Web Video Caller
milestones.description: Video Chat Application, in which you can have fun with your best buddy by easy video chit chatting.
